name: Verify GET custom-deployment–<id> without auth header
description:
### Pre-conditions:
- Service Deployment app installed.

### Steps:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Call `custom-deployment–<id>` API without auth header.

### Verify that:

- Http internal API
- Https external API
